relation: Can you guess the password in time? This one probably won't...
Poor Jeff. There is a well-known theory that if an Elder Mook is glaring at you with its eerie eyes, look away and you'll be fine. Of course, there is no scienitific evidence to support this theory.

This may have been done before, but here's my take on it. Presenting characters from Mother 1 as Invader Zim characters. Giegue as Zim and Loid as Dib, respectively. It just seemed to fit. "The Tallest can deny my request no longer! I am Giegue!! Bring me the R7038xxs!!!"
What, no broom to match? Careful, it knows a lot of devastating magical spells!
